title: Generative Chatbot using Google Gemini

overview.description: A generative chatbot powered by Google Gemini for advanced conversational capabilities
overview.details: Developed a generative chatbot utilizing Google Gemini to provide dynamic, context-aware conversations. The chatbot was designed to enhance user interactions, offering natural language understanding and generating responses that are contextually relevant, improving user engagement and overall satisfaction.

features: Context-aware responses based on user input
Improved user engagement and satisfaction through dynamic interactions
Seamless integration with Google Gemini API for intelligent dialogue management
